sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Senior Citizen Property Tax Refund Act.

sections.heading: Any city, village or incorporated town may by resolution or
sections.text:
ordinance refund any portion of real property taxes levied by and collected
for such city, village or incorporated town on a parcel or tract of real
property that is residential property occupied by the owner or owners thereof
as their principal dwelling place,
